https://flagpedia.net/download/vector

Download flag vector images of all countries
Country flag vector images available to download in a single package. 
Optimal for magazines and print or further modifications.

includes all 254 country flags (more info) packaged to ZIP archive
completely free for commercial and non-commercial use (public domain)
based on vector files from Wikipedia Commons
SVG, PDF (Adobe Acrobat), AI (Adobe Ilustrator) or EPS format
always up-to-date flags (last update on 5/2022)
filenames according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 & ISO 3166-2:GB country codes
